title.native: 名探偵コナン 天空の難破船
title.romaji: Meitantei Conan: Tenkuu no Lost Ship
title.english: Case Closed: The Lost Ship in the Sky

description:
The fourteenth movies in the series, The Lost Ship in the Sky, will be released on April 17, 2010. In the film's story, Kid has his eyes set on the "Lady of the Sky" jewel aboard Bell 3, the largest airship in the world. However, a mysterious terrorist group called Red Shamu-neko [Red Siamese Cat] has hijacked the airship itself, along with Conan and his allies Kogoro and Ran.

(Source: Anime News Network)
synonyms: Detective Conan Movie 14: Tenkuu no Lost Ship
Meitantei Conan Movie 14: Tenkuu no Lost Ship
Detektiv Conan: Das verlorene Schiff im Himmel
Detective Conan Movie 14: Il dirigibile perduto nel cielo

title.native: 名探偵コナンMAGIC FILE 4 ～大阪お好み焼きオデッセイ～
名探偵コナン

node.description:
__Favorite Food:__ Rice with curry

Gosho Aoyama, alternatively known by his real name Yoshimasa Aoyama, is a Japanese mangaka and animator, best known as the creator of Detective Conan (internationally known as Case Closed), Magic Kaito, and YAIBA.

Members include [Yuri Nakamura](https://anilist.co/staff/365002/), Hitoshi Okamoto, [Nana Azuki](https://anilist.co/staff/365000/), and [Hirohito Furui](https://anilist.co/staff/225154/), with Nakamura leading on vocals.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/浦上靖夫)

Founder of [Audio Planning U](https://anilist.co/studio/6561/), and the father of [Keiko](https://anilist.co/staff/162367/) and [Yasuyuki Urakami](https://anilist.co/staff/144509/).

In 2016, he received an Honorary Achievement Award for his role as a sound director in [Detective Conan](https://anilist.co/anime/235/).

He is an animator and character designer. Motohashi started working at Studio Z. Later, after leaving Studio Z, he started together with Hirayama Satoshi and Kamegaki Hajime Studio Z5. Today he is affiliated with Xebec and is the representative director of its subsidiary Xebec M2.

He is an animator and character designer. Motohashi started working at Studio Z. Later, after leaving Studio Z, he started together with Hirayama Satoshi and Kamegaki Hajime Studio Z5. Today he is affiliated with Xebec and is the representative director of its subsidiary Xebec M2.
Yamamoto Yasuichirou is a director. He is best known as the current director of the Meitantei Conan franchise.
**Tomoko Fukunaga** is a Japanese animator and animation director.
